item.description:
It's monday night so you it's time to pop a cheap beer, sit on the couch by yourself and watch Monday Night Football... or you can check out trippy electronics, vocoders, and bandmembers with names like Tobacco, Iffernaut and The Seven Fields of Aphelion.

They're touring in support of their new album "Cobra Juicy," but I also highly recommend "Dandelion Gum."

Tickets are $15, not sure if they're expecting to a sellout show.

We'll meet at the far side of the venue, near the stairs. I'll send an email the day of the show with a way to identify myself and my cell number.

http://www.thedise.com/
http://grooveshark.com/#!/blackmothsuperrainbow
http://www.blackmothsuperrainbow.com/
item.name: Black Moth Super Rainbow @ Paradise!
